message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in your product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $11,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,000 to make this deal work.  It's a fair price considering the value of the product.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
